abilities.name: Damage Switch
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon SP to another of your Pokémon SP. This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
